title: 俺的MOD安不成
txt_content: 我一直想安装MOD可一直是下完以后安装的时候找不到脚本求解释file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1339266401/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/J24G}8X1E{WML0NC91VG)K8.jpg 打开后是这样子的[img=756,458]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1339266401/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/5B)E$Q[B~(MBCQRGRPWD8Q7.jpg[/img] file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1339266401/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/V(]3QK4W7J4E9ZX@S0$$W}9.jpg

replies.author: 天空の遗迹
replies.txt_content: 被人抢先吐槽了……在学装mod之前建议LZ先学习一下怎么传图：http://www.mcbbs.net/misc.php?mod=faq&action=faq&id=5
